recommendation list.description: A formula for uneven and blemish-prone skin.

recommendation list.name: Mandelic Acid 10%
recommendation list.description: A gentler exfoliant in serum form.

recommendation list.name: Natural Moisturizer
recommendation list.description: Keeps the outer layer of your skin protected and well-hydrated, without feeling greasy.
recommendation list.ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate, Arginine, Sodium PCA, PCA, Lactates, Lactic Acid, and Minerals

recommendation list.name: Squalance Cleanser
